Articles.Content:
Hello all,

A long time ago there was some development of a Crawler for KSP that was never completed to the best of my knowledge. The files for the existing work done look pretty great. (You can find them below)

I am by no means a modder but I would love if someone would resurrect this mod. It would bring a great new dynamic to the game. I have several ideas for the mod myself, including the ability to launch vessels on the crawler just outside the VAB so a short drive would be needed down the crawlerway to the launchpad. If anyone is interested in continuing work on this mod I for one would be very pleased.

Thanks for your consideration.
Yeah I am aware of this mod, I'm just hoping someone will implement the stockalike crawler and tracks pictured here.
you could make that with Kerbal Foundries, B9, Infernal robotics, and Buffalo Base/vehicle pack.
